-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Provides main functions using warp-tls for yesod projects
--   
--   This package makes possible to build Yesod web applications that
--   provide SSL support.
@package yesod-tls
@version 1.4.1

module Yesod.Default.MainTLS

-- | Run your app, taking environment, port, and TLS settings from the
--   commandline.
--   
--   <tt><a>fromArgs</a></tt> helps parse a custom configuration
--   
--   <pre>
--   main :: IO ()
--   main = cert key defaultMain (fromArgs parseExtra) makeApplication
--   </pre>
defaultMainTLS :: (Show env, Read env) => FilePath -> FilePath -> IO (AppConfig env extra) -> (AppConfig env extra -> IO Application) -> IO ()

-- | Same as <tt>defaultMain</tt>, but gets a logging function back as well
--   as an <tt>Application</tt> to install Warp exception handlers.
defaultMainLogTLS :: (Show env, Read env) => FilePath -> FilePath -> IO (AppConfig env extra) -> (AppConfig env extra -> IO (Application, LogFunc)) -> IO ()
type LogFunc = Loc -> LogSource -> LogLevel -> LogStr -> IO ()
